text: Ushaw College (formally St Cuthbert's College, Ushaw), is a former Catholic seminary near the village of Ushaw Moor, County Durham, England. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ushaw: Historic House, Chapels & Gardens official site * Roman Catholic Encyclopaedia Entry for Ushaw College * Ushaw College Library * St Cuthbert's Society, Ushaw (Alumni) * Thomas Eyre, the first President Category:County Durham Category:1560s establishments Category:Colleges and universities in England Category:16th-century establishments in England
title: Ushaw College
